title: Crime Alert 09.28.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.28.21
description:
A son arrested after rolling his mom's body in a tarp and driving 130 miles. A clothing thief caught wearing the evidence of her crime.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
